title: Backend: Setup project dependencies (Prisma, tRPC, NextAuth, Vitest)
body:
## Description
Install and configure all required backend dependencies.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Install Prisma and @prisma/client
- [ ] Install tRPC packages
- [ ] Install NextAuth v5

body:
